reviews.review_msg: Class with Debbie is fun. The material is really engaging. She is very softspoken and shy, but polite and caring. She mixes class up with lecture/discussion/film and is very interested in the material as well. She incorporates student questions into next week's lecture--very in tune with our needs. I appreciate Debbie a lot as an instructor.

Efe is very passionate about what he teaches however I found him very unclear with vague expectations.  I had a class with him 2014 /15 . The material he chose for the class were interesting but it was hard to sit in the class through the lecture. Lots of little group assignments which I found annoying(not of an interesting kind).
